Improvements.Improvement: Extract repeated codes into a method
Improvements.Description: There is a repeated block of code that checks the tags of an object and throws a runtime exception if the tags do not meet certain conditions. This block of code is repeated twice with only minor differences, so it can be extracted into a new method. This would improve the readability and maintainability of the code.
Since Context implements AutoCloseable, we can use try-with-resources to ensure that the context is closed automatically. This would improve resource management and error handling.
